document_data.name: Pale Tree
document_data.mainbody: '''The Pale Tree''' was the [[divine realm]] of [[Solonor Thelandira]], the [[elven]] god of archery, as he was always on the hunt.
document_data.Description:
The Pale Tree itself was a glorious white tree located in the midst of a deep green grove. It had silver leaves and roots of a mud-like gray color and grew far taller than any of the trees surrounding it. Ropes and platforms were seamlessly built among the branches of the white tree.

Beyond the grove was a region of deep forests of redwood trees and rapid streams—all of which Solonor held as his domain.
document_data.Location: The realm was located in the greater realm of [[Arvandor]], home of [[Seldarine]], in the thickest part of Arvandor's forests.
document_data.Inhabitants: Living atop the platforms of the Pale Tree's branches were the [[petitioner]]s of Keen-Eye, along with others who chose to dwell there.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The elves believed that the white tree at the center of the grove had magical powers. Some claimed that they served as an aphrodisiac; others believed that the leaves could cure ailments. In any case, the leaves were made into [[garland]]s or bouquets by those who could gain access to them.
